alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Jefferson; Johnson; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 7:12PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, Glascock, Washington, Johnson and Jefferson Counties through 800 PM EST... At 712 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Bastonville to near Nicklesville, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Sandersville, Louisville, Wrightsville, Gibson, East Dublin, Wrens, Wadley, Davisboro, Tennille, Adrian, Harrison, Toomsboro, Stapleton, Bartow, Oconee, Avera, Riddleville, Edge Hill and Edgehill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
